title: Post Hextech Repair Tool, still absurdly high ping spikes
body:
Ran hextech repair tool, uninstalled, reinstalled, patched, etc.  Having a constant ping of 43, it will jump to 200-500 range (with yesterday up in the 1000s) for no reason.  This happens when in team fights AND when just running to lane in the beginning of the game.
Tested internet connection speed 75 down, 45 up. Updated Windows, restarted laptop, done all I could think of.
Please help, my laptop is exceeding the recommended specs for your game.  This has been going on since patch 7.5.

replies.body: There might be some kind of settings that are making it hard for your network to keep a stable connection with our game servers causing your ping to randomly spike. Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to check for any network issues and let me know if that helped!
What specifically would impede on connection to your game servers? Would like to know so i know where to go exactly to remedy this.

I'd recommend going through that guide step by step since any one of those steps could be the underlying issue. It's hard for me to narrow it down without having more info. I'd probably try switching to a wired connection first, but be sure to go through each step if that doesn't help.
